entities.name: bathilda bagshot
entities.description: Bathilda is mentioned as the author of A History of Magic. She is also referred to as an extremely old woman who might have been entrusted with the sword by Dumbledore.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as reacting dramatically to a possibility and expressing concern about Bathilda having the sword.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being concerned about a Death Eater and reacting to Hermione's dramatic gasp.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as having possibly entrusted the sword with Bathilda and not revealing that he had replaced it with a fake.

entities.name: muriel
entities.description: Muriel is mentioned as saying that Bathilda was 'gaga'.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about the possibility of Bathilda having the sword.
Hermione is also concerned about the possibility of Bathilda having the sword.
